title: Cold Case: FBI - The Salem Witch
description: Justice is for the Living...and for the Dead.In the small New England town of Hadley, Massachusetts, a mother and daughter have gone missing, and all signs point to the mother’s abusive, alcoholic boyfriend as the culprit. After a weeks-long, active investigation, however, local and state police come up empty and the boyfriend walks away, a free man.Ten years pass by, and FBI Assistant Director Marvin Ledds happens to be passing through the area when he reads a local newspaper story about the tenth anniversary of the women’s disappearance. Their fates left unknown, the assistant director decides that he has just the man—and just the right woman—to look into this heartbreaking mystery.- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -The Salem Witch introduces FBI Special Agents Sam Nicks and Danny Fielding, who are partnered with the mysterious Special Agent Joanna Weirdlee, an empowered witch from Salem, Massachusetts, out on her first field assignment with the Bureau. It's a traditional murder mystery with a paranormal twist!
author: William Dusty
